page.title: 04KN0TTINGLEY SPORTS' CENTRE.
page.content: {The Sports' Centre}offers many facilities:-a main hall for football and badminton,4 squash courts,a sauna, 2 pools a cafe and bar.About 1 000 people go daily. Apart from swimming, five-a-side football is most popular. There are 50 people on staff at the centre.The busiest time is a Sunday afternoon when families come.A balcony holds 500 people.There are about 150 spectators who go weekly.There are 6 galas a year.The opening times are 9am till 11pm all week.The table tennis is least favoured.There are 30 school visits for swimming every week.The large pool holds 250,000 gallons of water and the small pool holds 45,000 gallons.The pool was opened in 1969, and the centre was opened in 1975.
